pageProduct.name: Vicks Vaporub Baby Balsam 100g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Features

A good BabyBalsam massage can help your baby's skin retain moisture and stay soft, making your baby feel more comfortable. Apply on chest, neck, back and soles of feet for moisturizing and soothing baby care.

For babies 3 months and above. Please read the label and use as directed.

If applying to feet, keep feet covered to prevent accidental ingestion or slipping while walking.

Benefits of Vicks BabyBalsam

• Vicks BabyBalsam is specially formulated for babies

• Helps to gently moisturize, soothe and relax your baby

• Contains Aloe Vera extract, Coconut Oil and fragrances of Lavender, Rosemary & Eucalyptus

• It is gentle on baby's skin

• It is proven safe to use on babies 3 months and above

Vicks Baby Balsam contains Aloe Vera extract, Coconut Oil and fragrances of Lavender, Rosemary & Eucalyptus. It is specially developed to gently moisturize, soothe and relax your baby.

General Information

Vicks BabyBalsam Decongestant Rub moisturises, soothes, and relaxes your baby. Together with your loving touch, Vicks BabyBalsam helps to gently moisturise, soothe and relax your baby.

Vicks BabyBalsam is specially developed for your baby in association with baby and skin experts. Made with fragrances of Rosemary, Lavender & Eucalyptus and extract of Aloe Vera and is dermatologists confirmed.

Suitable For: Babies 3 months and above.

Size: 100g

Fragrance: Lavender and Rosemary and Eucalyptus

Dermatologically Approved?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Moisturise, soothe and relax your baby

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not use directly on face or on broken or damaged skin. Do not use in mouth or in nostrils. Do not heat in water, a vaporizer, a microwave oven or on the stove. Keep this product out of reach of children. Keep areas of application loosely covered to avoid accidental ingestion or slipping while walking. Avoid use if known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients. Replace jar lid when not in use.

Ingredients

Petrolatum, Fragrances, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.

Contains: Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil and Fragrances.

Directions

Use only as intended. Gently massage on chest, neck, back and soles of feet to help soothe and comfort.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool place.
